titles.title: State and Local Candidate Fairness Act of 2003

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the graduated income tax rates that apply to principal campaign committees of candidates for Congress shall apply to all comparable committees of candidates for State and local offices.
State and Local Candidate Fairness Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: State and Local Candidate Fairness Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the graduated income tax rates applicable to principal campaign committees of candidates for Congress shall also apply to all comparable committees of candidates for State and local offices.
